abstract: Return on equity remains subpar; without some one-time extras, the bank’s core earnings would need to rise almost 40 percent to exceed its cost of capital.
snippet: Return on equity remains subpar; without some one-time extras, the bank’s core earnings would need to rise almost 40 percent to exceed its cost of capital.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America’s best quarterly earnings in years highlight a tougher task ahead.

headline.main: Strong Earnings for Bank of America, but Tough Task Ahead
